author: Teemperor
body:
This is supposed to fix the cycle: DataFormats/GeometryCommonDetAlgo  DataFormats/GeometrySurface  DataFormats/GeometryCommonDetAlgo

Open for alternatives to doing this.

More information here: https://teemperor.de/pub/cms/cycle1.cycle.html
title: Moved DeepCopyPointer.h to DataFormats/Common
